OOC: Damn! I thought maybe you people would give me a chance to get online =
and reply! And BTW, did anyone post a reply to the exploding dynamite near =
the Chivtron base, as well as all the shots darting towards it?


IC:


McG=
owan laughs.

McGowan: Yes, this bitch again! And you retards will learn no=
t to let your guard down when I'm around!

McGowan lets Starstomp's lame ra=
pids hit her. McGowan fires off a missile towards Starstomp along with 5 pl=
asma shots.

Virgo jumps over Quetzalcoatl's missile and fires off an energ=
y draining dart towards Quetzalcoatl along with 5 shots.

Barrymore is stru=
ck by Quetzalcoatl's missile and pulls out a sicle, taking a few steps clos=
er to Quetzalcoatl, firing at her 6 times.

Depp fires at Starstomp 8 times=
, while approaching with his kitana held high in the air.

Lee fires off a =
fireball at Quetzalcoatl and one at Starstomp.

Birdbot fires at Starstomp =
7 times, aiming for her stomach.

Papertron pulls out a crossbow.

Papertro=
n: A FURRY MURRY! ALL WILL BE, DEAD IN YOUR GRAVES!

Papertron fires 2 arro=
ws at Quetzalcoatl and 2 at Starstomp....

~~~~~~

Inside the Chivtron base=
, Hazel smiled some as Bronze gave her all the details on Pink's death.

Ha=
zel: Wonderful. She was a bitch anyway. Big favor those attackers did for m=
e. I could get a smart stooge anyway.

Bronze: And they have Brown as a hos=
tage.

Hazel: Eh, who cares.

Hazel looks at Bronze, Cerulean and Periwinkl=
e, wanting their answer.

Bronze: Not me.

Cerulean: I hate him.

Periwinkl=
e: Yes...

Hazel: Good. Cause they could throw that shit into a waterfall o=
f acid with 50 million dollars strapped to his metal ass, and I wouldn't ca=
re. Just to be rid of him.

Bronze: Heh.

Hazel: Let's go for a walk around=
 this scummy little toilet.

Hazel begins a walk down a  hall which Cerulea=
n walking by her side and Bronze following from behind, talking about how m=
uch he loves to kick ass...
